search.name: California Death Index 1940-1997
search.description:
Search the California Death Index from 1940-1997
Switches:
/birthplace - Specify birth place state
/father - Specify father's last name
/mother - Specify mother's maiden name
/sex - Specify sex: Male or Female
Examples:
cadi McGlashan
cadi mcglashan /m beaver
cadi mcglashan /s f

form.name: cadif
form.COMMENT:
The input element above, "stype", was a SELECT element with the following options...
Exact Soundex Metaphone

The input element above, "bplace", was a SELECT element with the following options...
All ALABAMA ALASKA ARIZONA ARKANSAS CALIFORNIA CANADA CHINA COLORADO CONNECTICUT CUBA DELAWARE DIST. OF COLUMBIA FLORIDA GEORGIA GUAM HAWAII IDAHO ILLINOIS INDIANA IOWA JAPAN KANSAS KENTUCKY LOUISIANA MAINE MARYLAND MASSACHUSETTS MEXICO MICHIGAN MINNESOTA MISSISSIPPI MISSOURI MONTANA NEBRASKA NEVADA NEW HAMPSHIRE NEW JERSEY NEW MEXICO NEW YORK NORTH CAROLINA NORTH DAKOTA OHIO OKLAHOMA OREGON PENNSYLVANIA PHILIPPINES PUERTO RICO REST (OTHER) RHODE ISLAND SOUTH CAROLINA SOUTH DAKOTA TENNESSEE TEXAS UNKNOWN UTAH VERMONT VIETNAM VIRGIN ISLANDS VIRGINIA WASHINGTON WEST VIRGINIA WISCONSIN WYOMING

All ALABAMA ALAMEDA(01) ALAMEDA(60) ALASKA ALPINE AMADOR ARIZONA ARKANSAS BUTTE CALAVERAS CANADA COLORADO COLUSA CONNECTICUT CONTRA COSTA CUBA DEL NORTE DELAWARE DIST.
